short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talkie is a simple text to speech (TTS) Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Talkie is now available as a convenient Chrome Extension! Perfect for those who have difficulty speaking or are looking for an alternative way to communicate. What you can do with the Talkie extension:

- Use the Text to Speech function from the browser.
- Translate texts into different language.
- Select text on webpages and have it spoken aloud instantly.

Talkie makes communication easier, right from your web browser. See also our iOS and Android app for the smartphone or tablet.
